allow: Bash(mysql -h localhost -P 23330 -u root -p123456 --protocol=TCP --ssl-mode=DISABLED --default-character-set=utf8mb4 dota2 -e "SET NAMES utf8mb4; SELECT p.id, p.nickname, p.icon FROM players p WHERE p.isDeleted = ''n'' LIMIT 5;")

Bash(mysql -h localhost -P 23330 -u root -p123456 --protocol=TCP --ssl-mode=DISABLED --default-character-set=utf8mb4 dota2 -e "SET NAMES utf8mb4; SELECT h.id, h.name_loc, h.icon FROM heroes h WHERE h.isDeleted = ''n'' AND h.icon IS NOT NULL LIMIT 5;")
